channel.title: raycoarana.com
channel.description: My coding adventures and other random stuff

item.title: Esto empieza...
item.author: Rayco Araña
item.description:
[code language=”java”] package com.raycoarana.blog;

public class Blog {

public static void main(String[] args) {
    Blog blog = new Blog();
    blog.addTheme("feather");
    blog.prepare();
    blog.publish(new PublishListener(){
        public void onSuccess() {
            System.out.println("Let's start coding!");
        }
    });
} } [/code]
